Containers.Name: Netatmo Librato
Containers.Description: Netatmo Librato pushes value from your [netatmo thermostat and weather station](https://www.netatmo.com/) to [librato cloud metrics](https://www.librato.com/) In order to use it, you need a developper login from netatmo and an app creation to retrieve a secret token. You also need a token from your librato metrics account. Then you have to create a secret.yml file according to this [pattern](https://github.com/sdesbure/netatmo_librato/blob/master/secret.yml.example) and put it in /config volume [b][u][span style='color: #071132006;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where secret.yml should belong supervisor will store it's logs.[br]
